text: I really really wanted to like Kitty <@UDSU53PEG> but I actually have a tmux based workflow and sadly the kitty image protocol does not work with it. I am optimistic that someday there will be better interop between the two but for now, I also use Alacritty like <@U6NFPDBV1>.

text: I’ve been trying to get higher refresh rates for my Mac, and I switched my *ROG PG279Q* to 144Hz. Then I opened a Kitty window. I don’t think it’s doing high refresh rates. It’s nowhere near what you get on an iPad Pro. Maybe there’s some configuration option I can tweak?

text:
> this has a tab switching system
A proper tiling window manager makes tabs and panes irrelevant for me :slightly_smiling_face: But when I don't have one, I use tmux to get tabs + panes
